title: Elective Course Choosing
content:
I am starting my 5th sem soon.

I am considering taking IoT, and Big Data, while for sem 6 I plan to take computer vision and deep learning for MIDS specialization.

Could any seniors tell if it's a good idea based on difficulty and time management

comments.body:
Don't run behind MIDS Certificate ! It is absolutely useless from Placements point of view. They are selling you another valueless paper 

Take subjects because you love them !!
